title: 服务器崩溃，开服进去几分钟就崩溃
author: tyuo1232007
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This doesn't make any sense!

Description: Exception in server tick loop

replies.author: tyuo1232007
replies.txt_content: 服务器里装了神秘，工业，和风竹，拔刀剑，高级太阳能，NPC

replies.author: 我才是小灰灰
replies.txt_content:
图标的问题
但是看不出来是哪个插件。。
